summary: 1991  was a common year starting on Tuesday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: Jordan-Claire Green  is an American actress, a musician and singer. She is most well known for her role as Michelle in the film School of Rock. Ten years after the film's release, the cast, together with Jack Black, gathered in Austin, Texas, where they greeted fans on a red carpet, took part in a public re-screening of the film followed by a Q&A, after which they reunited on stage for a live music performance.
title: Jordan-Claire Green
